page.title: 19THE GUARDIAN
page.content: The Guardian was founded in{1901}and it reports on news in the Bodmin area.It contains items about T.V.programmes, weather and property. Items appearing about Lanivet on Thursday, July 18th 1985 are an ad. for Lanivet Motors,a dog called Beth, a wedding and houses for sale. Beth won second and third prizes in a dog show in Somerset.The cheepest car is Â£100 and the dearest is Â£11,000.Houses are about Â£44,000 and land is Â£1,750 per acre.The wedding held in Lanivet Church was between Michele Sandercock of this parish and Richard Gibbons of Lostwithiel.
